Description:
The job role is responsible to provide system support to Delivery operations and to prepare reports for the management and showrooms, furthermore, prepares payments related documents Petty Cash, POD Proceeds collection.To make following transactions in SAP for return deliveries and dented items returned by drivers or on the basis of emails received from showrooms.
o Return Reschedule Deliveries
o Cancellation Deliveries
o Subsequent Deliveries
To Create Daily, Weekly & Monthly Reports
To Attend Customer Collect
To attend and make shipment for the customers coming to collect their items from the WH.
To attend customer calls and solve their problem related deliveries.
To upload the data in Bonus calculation files
To prepare OT for the dept
To prepare payments Memos , for Truck and Labors hired from third party suppliers
To submit collected cash to Bank / Treasury
E mails checking , printing and translation in Arabic
Follow up with WH for unpicked deliveriesSkills
Skills: Computer & Software Knowledge – Basic hardware & applications knowledge used by the business

Problem Solving & Troubleshooting & Reporting - Determining causes of operating errors & problems and identifying their solutions. If solution beyond their control, reporting it to the concerned dept / person.
Bilingual – Should be able to read and write English and Arabic to understand and answer mails from showrooms and to take necessary action on them.
